My Work. About. Contact.

Project.

Sharefolio App

Deliverables.

Logo Design, UI & UX

The client was looking for a creative, user centered solution that helps investors and companies connect with potential partners. I was involved in an initial research, personas creation and gathering user needs. I was leading designing phase being responisble for User Interface and User Experience of the app as well as worked closely with the developer to deliver the final product.

About.

Sharefolio is a finance app connecting investors & listed companies.
